stories.text: One of the MANGA companies reached out to me for an interview. I cannot ethically work for the said company. How was your experience refusing to interview with the company for ethical reasons? Should I mention this moral dilemma in the email to the recruiter?
stories.title: Ask HN: Have you ever refused to interview because of ethical reasons?
